description.value:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Undying Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Undying Spells
Warlock LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlindnessD]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFalseLife0]{False Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidance00]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplResistance]{Resistance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSilence000]{Silence}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFeignDeath]{Feign Death}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpeakWithD]{Speak with Dead}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAuraOfLife]{Aura of Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplContagion0]{Contagion}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLegendLore]{Legend Lore}
